Actions.Name: Rumble
Effects: Deals damage for every adjacent object or pit.
Attack target is poisoned. Poisoned foes are shattered.

Actions.Name: Seismic Crusher
Actions.Description: Non-flying characters are shoved to either side of the line.

Actions.Name: Upheaval
Actions.Description: Summon a height 1 boulder object or a pit in a free space in range 6.
